video_title: Artificial Intelligence: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
video_description:
Artificial intelligence is increasingly becoming part of our lives, from self-driving cars to ChatGPT. John Oliver discusses how AI works, where it might be heading next, and, of course, why it hates the bus.

video_title: The Next Global Superpower Isn't Who You Think | Ian Bremmer | TED
video_description:
Who runs the world? Political scientist Ian Bremmer argues it's not as simple as it used to be. With some eye-opening questions about the nature of leadership, he asks us to consider the impact of the evolving global order and our choices as participants in the future of democracy.

video_title: Elon Musk's BRUTALLY Honest Interview With Tucker Carlson (2023)
video_description:
Elon Musk's BRUTALLY Honest Interview With Tucker Carlson | In this interview, Tucker Carlson engages in a thought-provoking discussion with Elon Musk. Join them as they delve into a range of topics, shedding light on Tesla's achievements, as well as Musk's controversial entrepreneurial choices. 

Are you an ELON MUSK Fan? START HERE! 🚀

- Elon Musk Best SAVAGE Moments in 8 Minutes Straight!: https://youtu.be/JVO5Kibf7dw
- Elon Musk's Being a SAVAGE For 9 Minutes Straight!: https://youtu.be/XGdItXdupGY
- Elon Musk's TERRIFYING Warning about Google AI: https://youtu.be/44NBrihVqAM
- Elon Musk: "this will AFFECT everyone in 3-4 months.": https://youtu.be/_bfqviAqtvo

For More Videos Like This Subscribe Now! 👉🏻 bit.ly/3D69T88

Musk brings forth his concerns about artificial intelligence (AI) and emphasizes the urgent need for regulations in this enlightening episode of Tucker Carlson Today. According to Musk, the potential dangers posed by AI surpass those of mismanaged aircraft or automobile production, as it has the capacity for "civilizational destruction." Delving further, Musk shares his involvement in OpenAI and expresses reservations about the organization's current trajectory. Additionally, Musk emphasizes the importance of prioritizing a pro-human society over profit in the relentless pursuit of technological advancement.

Prepare to gain valuable insights as Elon Musk covers an array of engaging subjects during his interview with Tucker Carlson. He shares his perspective on the impact of the pandemic on the commercial real estate market, addresses concerns surrounding inflation, and highlights the significance of investing in companies based on the quality of their products, services, and sensible management. Furthermore, Musk sheds light on the media's influence on public opinion. He raises awareness about how a select few editors-in-chief can subtly manipulate the public narrative, resulting in a less truthful and accurate portrayal of events. Musk also reveals his plans to transform Twitter into the most trusted platform on the internet, providing people with exposure to diverse political opinions to ensure access to unfiltered truth prior to elections.

Don't miss out on this captivating conversation between Tucker Carlson and Elon Musk, where they tackle pressing issues surrounding Tesla's success, Musk's unconventional business decisions, and much more. Tune in now!

Tesla Videos: 🚘 : https://bit.ly/2ZaTXBs
Elon Musk Videos:🦾: https://bit.ly/3x56bb6

For the best videos be sure to subscribe and turn on the post notifications so you don't miss any videos and once you've subscribed, comment something nice for a shoutout.

Popularly referred to as the Real-life Tony Stark, Elon Musk is the founder and CEO of SpaceX, an American aerospace manufacturer and space transportation services. He is also the co-founder, CEO, and product architect at Tesla Motors, the founder of The Boring Company and Co-founder of Neuralink and initial chairman of OpenAI.
